HDG.LP.content: since Plato, soul suprasensuous (Übersinnlichen), if it appears in sensible world, does so as a castaway (verschlagen) > on Earth, soul doesn’t have the right cast (rechten Schlag), doesn’t belong, is something strange (ein Fremdes) [body is soul’s prison]

HDG.LP.content: soul is strange on earth (Wesen of soul), always underway, follows the draw (Zug) of its nature > earth where the soul’s wandering can’t reach, soul seeks (sucht) the earth [Schelling], such poetic wandering builds/dwells on earth, can save (retten) the earth as earth

HDG.LP.content: [finitude] soul called to die, to go under, Untergang, to leave the earth behind: not a catastrophe, not a mere withering decay (Verfall) > Der Schritt des Fremden goes away in the dusk/twilight (Dämmerung), not Untergang (destruction, twilight of end), Auch der Morgen dämmert, twilight also a rising (Aufgehen), night’s blue rises > Ghostly (Geistliche) twilights the blue, ghostly marks (kennzeichnet) the twilight

HDG.LP.content: nocturnal silence (Schweigen der Nacht), silence itself w/ its night, belongs (gehört) to apartness (Abgeschiedenheit), die Dämmerung als das Tor zum Untergang [passage], the soul’s nocturnal wing-beat (der nächtliche Flügelschlag der Seele) > [the reign of this gathering in apartness unfolds w/out delay, nicht nachträglich] > the apartness is ghostly (geistlich) > [sister of stormy sadness]

HDG.LP.content: [spirit & soul] spirit drives soul in das Unterwegs, carries soul over to strangeness > soul is gifted (beschenkt) w/ the soul > spirit is the animator (Beseeler) [cf. p. 181 pain animates] > but soul guards the spirit, “feeds” it, no spirit w/out soul: soul invests spirit w/ flame (its very nature), the glow of melancholy (Schwermut), “the patience (Sanftmut) of the lonely (einsamen) soul”

HDG.LP.content: solitude (Einsame) carries soul toward the One (Einzigen), the burden (Schwere) of fate: carry the soul toward the spirit > soul’s melancholy glows when Soul in journey enters the widest width of its properness (ihres eigenen), which is wandering > soul’s greatness, achieve flaming vision (Anschauen), becomes at home (proper) in pain [pain as MOP?]: pain’s nature is in itself converse (gegenwendiges)

HDG.LP.content: flaming pain tears away, its rending (Fortriss) consigns [marks?] (einzeichnet) wandering soul to conjunction (Fuge) of storm [heaven]/hunt [God] > would seem pain’s rending would overwhelm (überwältigen), rather than letting soul prevail (walten) in veiling radiance > but! [here is Heidegger’s refusal of differance], the beholding vision (Anschauen) can rejoin (fügt zurück) the flaming sweep (flammenden Fortriss) to the fitting submission (Fügsame) of seeing acceptance (schaunden Hinnehmens) [moral image of thought], der Rückriss im Schmerz, pain achieves its mildness, its power (Walten) to convey/disclose

HDG.LP.content: soul: great giver of life > everything that is alive is painful > pain is the animator (Beseelende) [cf. 180 the soul is the animator] > only the soulful fulfills destiny, capable, gifted as such, of joining in harmony the mutual bearing (wechselweisen Sichtragens) by which all living things belong > relation of fitness (Bezug des Taugens), all that lives is fit, i.e. good: good is good painfully > only true in pain > because pain is converse, kann das Lebende sein Mitanwesendes in seiner jeweiligen Art verbergend entbergen [sheltering concealment], wahr-haft [preservation/truth] sein lassen [truth as letting beings truly be what they are]

HDG.LP.content: beneath the one semblance is concealed the Einfalt of pain, flaming the furthest when holds to itself most intimately [beholding vision] > pain as Grundzug of great soul, in pure harmony w/ holiness of blue: “blue shines upon the soul’s face by withdrawing into its own depth” > holy is present (west)/endures (währt) only by keeping w/in this withdrawal (in diesem Entzug verhält), turning vision toward fitting (Fügsame) [via flame of pain]

HDG.WL.content: acc. Aristotle [classical architectonic (Baugefüge) structure of language], letters show sounds, sounds show passions of soul, passions of soul show matters that arouse them (be-treffenden Sachen) > showing (Zeigen) holds up this classical structure > relation btwn Showing and what it shows (Gezeigten) becomes conventional relation btwn sign (Zeichen) & its signification (Bezeichnetem) > transformation (Änderung) of sign from something that shows (Zeigenden) to something that designates (Bezeichnenden): a change in the nature of truth

HDG.EC.content: too deplorable [?] to waste a complaint (Klage) on blinded leading-astray of our own people, the devastation of our native soul > the men had decided to remain silent about this devastation (Verwüstung), which existed for a long time, & can’t be reduced to a visible enumeration—not the result of instances of human death
